About Me

“ Be a Creative Front End developer. ”

About This Website

This site is a collection of bookmark and free e-book about Front End Development with the purpose of sharing my knowledge and passion for everyone.

It has been designed and built by hand from the ground up. It's handled through VueJS, NodeJS support API, database is controlled by MongoDB and all of things is compiled with Webpack.

About My Self

My name is Cuong, with a special passion for Front End Development. Be a Creative Front End Developer is my target, why?

Because I want to directly develop ideas with my creativity, I do not want to be limited in thinking and only following the design and marketing teams. As a fan of Front End, I will prove to the fucking developers who think FE is simple and easy that FE is an art.

*For more information, please take a look at
